text:
@PressSec The left are blaming his death on President Trump. 

DO NOT FALL FOR THIS. 

There is no PROOF where Mr. Cain contracted the coronavirus. 2+2 does not equal 5.

Mr. Cain was a cancer survivor with a weaked immune system.
 BLAME CHINA ... NOT TRUMP!!
